branchCategory.name: CA2
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's series CA2 is a light weight tie rod air cylinder.  Fine end of stroke cushioning adjustment is now possible due to the increase in the air cushion adjustment range.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2-Z, Air Cylinder Standard Type, Double Acting Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2 double acting, single rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder.  Fine end of stroke cushioning adjustment is now possible due to the increase in the air cushion adjustment range.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2W-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2 double acting, double rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder.  Fine end of stroke cushioning adjustment is now possible due to the increase in the air cushion adjustment range.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2Y-Z, Smooth Cylinder
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2Y double acting, single rod version smooth acting tie rod cylinder.  This option is perfect for low speeds or low pressure applications.  Capable of speeds as low as 5 mm/sec.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2K, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2K double acting, single non-rotating piston rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder.  This option should be used in situations when the load should not be allowed to rotate.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, and 63 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2KW, Air Cylinder, Non-Rotating, Double Acting Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2KW double acting, double non-rotating piston rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder. This option should be used in situations when the load should not be allowed to rotate. The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets. The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications. A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches. The CA2 is available in 40, 50, and 63 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)BA2, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, End Lock
branchItem.description: <p>Series CBA2 End Lock version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder. End of stroke locking mechanism locks the cylinder in place in case of a loss of air. Locks can be ordered for the extend stroke, retract stroke or both. The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications. A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches. The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)A2*Q, Air Cylinder, Low Friction, Double Acting Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2*Q is a low friction version of the light weight tie rod air cylinder.  Designed with low priston sliding resistance, this cylinder is ideal for applications such as contact pressure control. Low friction is in one direction only.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Option
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2 with high temperature resistant options are double acting, single rod version of the standard CA2 rod air cylinder.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bore sizes and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Stroke Option
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's series CA2 with stroke options is a light weight tie rod air cylinder.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets. A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches. The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Environmental Option
branchItem.description: <p>Series CA2 with environmental options are double acting, single rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinders made for those tough applications.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bore sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)A2, Air Cylinder, Double Acting Single Rod, Clean Room
branchItem.description: <p>Clean SMC's room versions of series CA2.  Available om both relief port and vacuum port type.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in a large variety of options that will make them suitable for many different applications.  A variety of auto switches are available for mounting, including compact switches and magnetic field resistant switches.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, and 63 bores sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>
